TopicTitle: What're the highest and lowest points in an orbit around a fruitbowl?

Articles.Content:
What\'re the highest and lowest points in an orbit around a fruitbowl?

The apple-apsis and pear-iapsis.

Feel free to come up with your own, equally terrible, jokes.

Wow. Before you watch your stories and go to bed, grandpa, you should tell us all about how you weren\'t allowed to go swimming for fear of catching the polio and how you could buy steaks for only a nickel.

Wow. Before you watch your stories and go to bed, grandpa, you should tell us all about how you weren\'t allowed to go swimming for fear of catching the polio and how you could buy steaks for only a nickel.

Polio travels and infects perfectly well in chlorinated water thank you

While not a perfect antiseptic against... Bah! I\'ll just let the mean ol\' wiki-nerds get ya\'!

More old man jokes, please!

Why doesn\'t the Dog Star ever laugh at jokes?
